website_summaries.verdict: If you'd like your practice goals to have a more authentic shape, try this set from NET PLAYZ.
pros: Set of two squared structure goals, each measuring 4 feet by 3 feet by 3 feet
Requires first time assembly and then easily sets up and folds up into carry bag
Stands up to use and abuse

customer_reviews.title: Good for youth soccer practice.
customer_reviews.text: These goals go together easy and fold up easy. They are lightweight and work very well. I would definitely buy again. I need them for practice and there’s no gold available, so I bought these. The only issues, and the reason for 4 stars... They are good for young kids. I coach youth soccer (kg-1st grade) and the big kickers can be tough on them. The other thing, the string on the ground can trip up very young kids, but that’s not very worrisome. All in all, I’m happy with them and would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: AntneeLINY

customer_reviews.title: You have to put these together it's not difficult. It will take at least 10 minutes out of your day if you wondering.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble easy to put away haven't used it on the field yet but seems pretty sturdy just remember to either use the anchors that they come with or buy some heavy duty ones at Walmart or at an outdoor store just in case You have some strong kickers.
customer_reviews.author: Serg

customer_reviews.title: Edited review
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 4 yr old nephew who is beginning soccer. It's perfect for him! The goals are smaller but I think a great size for youngsters. They are easy to store once you get them set up. Set up can be tricky and likely requires 2 people!-this was my original review...' After having this set for less than a month, the pieces that hold the net together completely broke in half on both nets. This is obviously a cheap set and very cheaply made. Would recommend getting a better quality net instead of wasting money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cracked crossbars.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Both broke after 3 practices with 3 and 4 year olds who can barely kick. The flaw is that these goals do not fold well back into the carry sack. Both crossbar polls fractured where they are supposed to twist and fold into a flat cone shape. I really liked the rectangular goals but think half circle Pop-goals would have been better. I contacted customer service and have not heard back. I'll update if and when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Durable; good size
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for my 6 year old boys soccer team. They like to dive in them and (attempt to) jump over them, for some reason, so they have been treated pretty rough and they bounce back perfectly. I like the size being bigger than most portable goals because this age needs more leeway from distance.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT price for two nets
customer_reviews.text: GREAT price for two nets! The quality of the soccer nets are really good and the setup can't be any easier. You put the nets together like a tent with poles, and after that they literally fold back up and set back up in seconds. It come with a travel pouch that you can put them into after fold-up. They are very light weight and for those harder kicks, they come with metal stakes. Can't beat the price and quality, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Only used twice and now are broken
customer_reviews.text: The kids used them a couple times and already they are broken. They were a donation for our small school and the PE coach started soccer a week ago and already the goal frames are broken and net is ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Donelle

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery, Very light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a year ago and my goals got stolen recently, so this is my second purchase. Shipped via Amazon Prime 2 day shipping, I was supposed to receive this product on 9/4 but I got it on 8/31. I was very happy with this item on my first purchase as it boasts the following... Pros: 1. Super light and easy to fold into the neat bag 2. Very easy to use once you assemble it 3. Flexible but sturdy and durable, perfect for pick up soccer Con. 1. Initial assembly/set up can be a bit challenge, but I figured it out and successfully assembled it in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Yohan Kim

customer_reviews.title: ... after the second time we practice these things crumble like a bad cookie
customer_reviews.text: So I'll plan on getting these so I can practice with my son playing soccer in the yard but after the second time we practice these things crumble like a bad cookie. Of course I took too long to return them and was outside the window so I had to eat the cost but I wouldn't recommend this to anyone else so you don't have to eat the cost.
customer_reviews.author: MegaTron JK

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money 2 nets for the price of 1..
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to install, have to have patience takes about 20 to 30 minutes to 1st set up. All in all it's great for the money especially coming with 2 nets. Very good size, actually bigger then I thought they would be. Won't disappoint. If this review helps please click helpful. I buy alot of products from Amazon I give my personal review and speak how it is. If I don't like something I will be the 1st to say. Hope your kids enjoy these nets as much as mine do.
customer_reviews.author: The lion

customer_reviews.title: Not acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: One of the nets is defective.Elastic cord that connects all parts together is broken and cannot be repaired I am having much difficulty trying to navigate replacement protocol at Amazon and there is no one to talk to at customer service.None of the links for replacement are working the way they should.Very frustrating as I am a prime member and will cease to be a Amazon customer of this does not get resolved.
customer_reviews.author: dannyjk

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 sets of these goals to use for both a preschool team and a traveling kindergarten team. The first set, one goal broke when it was folded. The second set, one goal broke when not in use. Before we started having issues with them breaking we loved them. They were sturdy, easy to fold and maneuverable. The first set lasted one season, the second set lasted a month. I am back to looking for better goals. I would not purchase this set if you need reliable goals.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Doza

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: While these were very easy to assemble initially and easy to fold down after assembled, they are not built to last. We used these for 1 practice with 5 year olds and they broke. The fiberglass upright crumpled where it attached to a joint and these would no longer stand upright. I wanted so badly for these to work as they were exactly what i needed, but sadly the materials used were not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Diana R. Ferree

customer_reviews.title: Broke by the third use.
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews prior to purchasing about the bars snapping, but I gave it a chance anyway. By the 3rd use, they were broken. These were only used for some front yard fun with a 3.5 and 1.5 year old. Definitely should have held up better. Only way to get a return is to ship them back, I don't have a box that will fit these in. They don't fold up small, flat, but not small. Not happy with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Be weary
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of the product having grown up using similar style pop us soccer goals. However, I’ve only used one out of the two goals a couple of times for my 3 year old daughter and when I went to pull them out of the bag, one of the crossbar poles is already broken. Very disappointing. Also very difficult to find any resources to help with getting a new plate of poles. This was only just delivered last month.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy, the slightest wind will rip them out the ground
customer_reviews.text: i like how the goals are foldable and easy to assemble and come with a tote bag to transport them, however, if you want good quality goals, i do not recommend these. make your own out of pvc pipe, wood, or metal...these will come out the ground with the first slightest wind, the first time you kick a ball into them, etc. I bought them for the kids to have something to do on our newly acquired 5 acres of land, but they are already destroyed and its only been 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Assembled and played with Once. Broken upon attempting to use a second time.
customer_reviews.text: Got one use out of it. The poles snapped in the storage position. I will try to contact company to get fixed or refund. 20 days outside of Amazon return policy. Do yourself a favor, don't buy this. Edit: Thank you Amazon for being a great company. I got refund and used the money toward Pogg goals. Much better!!!
customer_reviews.author: D and R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: One net was broken right out of the box. The elastic inside one of the tubes was outside in the box. Had to use tape to get the goal assembled. I have to say, I was not Impressed. Seems a little pricey to have to modify it before it was even used.
customer_reviews.author: D. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Just insert each pole set slowly
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up easy play use the anchors for more security easy clean up comes with a storage bag
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: This is great !
customer_reviews.text: I originally was going to buy a net off the fb marketplace but I decided to check amazon and when I seen NetPlayz nets I read the reviews immediately. The package arrived a few days earlier than expected and given everything going on with covid we were really happy. Packaging was great and easy to open up. Parts were all there minor sewing issue but with a pair of scissors it was fixed in seconds. My kids were exhausted after this afternoon parents vs kids soccer match!! Expecting showers later this evening so we folded it right up and it fit right in the bag easily!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany candelario

customer_reviews.title: Not Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pop up goals back in May. I only used them for a few weeks towards the end of spring soccer and just got them back out for our first fall practice and both goals were broke by the end of practice. The top "pole" on each one cracked after being hit with a soccer ball. These are 7yr olds so it is not like they are taking heavy shots. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Awful material
customer_reviews.text: The only positive thing about this product is how easy it is to fold. Trying to place it in the bag for the first time, the bag was too small and the zipper broke. Then, after one used the cloth covering one of the poles connecting the goal broke through. The second attempt to place the goals in the bag further ruined the zipper and one of the zips broke off. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Anice Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy setup and takedown.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough for my 4 y/o. Comes with stakes top secure to ground. You'll need these as it's very l light weight. Pretty easy to put together and take down. Storage bag works well but already lost one of the zippers. Fortunately it came with double zippers. I'd recommend for small children. Probably would work for kids older than 8, depending on their size and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdier than it appears
customer_reviews.text: When I opened up the package and saw the poles, I thought, "how cheap." After having put the goals together, It appeared sturdier. While using them, my 3rd grade students blasted a few shots into the nets. It held up very well. We played on the blacktop because the grass field was soaked from a recent rain. The goals barely moved after the soccer ball was shot into them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very good training goals
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the training goals so far. Very simple to set up at the beginning of practice; not quite so easy to put away in their case at the end (although easier with two people). Very durable though, with a bunch of 7 years olds throwing themselves at them each week! First time assembly was not particularly easy - the instructions could be a lot better - but one simply gets through it and you don' have to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: I fought with these for 15 minutes and could not get one of them set up. The sticks kept separating and felt very flimsy so I kept thinking I had set it up wrong. I finally figured it out and they are decent nets. A bit flimsy and likely will get broken by my kids after not too long but at this price they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his birthday a couple months back. We use these often to try to get him interested in soccer and it seems to be working. Not only are they easy to set up but extremely easy to put away. They do not take a lot of room to store during the colder months. I’m very happy with the quality and have enjoyed these on multiple occasions
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Looks good so far
customer_reviews.text: Edited - our kids love these nets but there are a few issues. They do not easily fold up, the stakes used to anchor down the nets are longer than necessary and they break easily. Have not opened it yet since it's for Christmas but it seems great. Only issue is the packaging, it's a brown box but has a big picture of the goal on both sides. (My oldest now knows one of her gifts)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lee

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for indoor soccer for some pretty wild pretty wild middle-schoolers (for physical education class). They haven't torn them up (it's been a few months). I would definitely call them durable.
customer_reviews.author: mairejain

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy fabrics led to early tears
customer_reviews.text: This product was fairly easy to put together. Did not give a 5 star review because after one use, there were parts of the nets (specifically the straps) that broke. The bag also ripped the first time trying to put the nets inside. Make sure to use the provided stakes otherwise the nets knock over fairly easily. Otherwise, the kids greatly enjoy playing with them
customer_reviews.author: samantha shimp

customer_reviews.title: Great little nets
customer_reviews.text: I have one 8 year old who played her first season of soccer and one 5 year old who will play this fall. I got these because I wanted something I could easily set up outside, and just as easily put away, so that it doesn't get destroyed in like 2 weeks from living outside. Great size for their age. Easy to put together and super easy to break down.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora2288

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my sons birthday so him and his soccer buddies could play at his birthday party and the frame string that holds everything together was untied and impossible to re-sting through all the pipes. The product only came with 1 net and the description said a set of 2. I'm not happy at all with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Loebs

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and great size. 2 nice nets for the price of one on other sites. Putting them together is simple. We had a big wind storm the other night and was worried we forgot to take them down but they were fine and in the same spot. Would order them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer Nets for our backyard and on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great product for our backyard. We have a 7 year old and she really enjoys practicing her soccer. Once together it’s a synch to put up and pack away. Really nice carrying case to take to the park as well.
customer_reviews.author: kam

customer_reviews.title: good for younger soccer
customer_reviews.text: I played a few sessions and each time someone put a good shot in the corner the whole net would just fold up from the force of a not that hard shot. The net is fine but did notice some fraying so I reinforced it with paracord. Also when assembling it gives you fiberglass splinters that hurt for a couple of days with sharp pain. after a more intense session, one of the fiberglass poles completely shattered. also, directions for putting this together are confusing so I had to look up the youtube tutorial.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A.

customer_reviews.title: Both Goals Broke within Two Weeks I’d Minimal Use
customer_reviews.text: Would have been great had both goals not broken within two weeks. The size was perfect for both kids (and adults playing with kids). It was cool how you could fold it up for travel, but we never even got to do that because both goals broke. The top center stick snapped in each goal. We barely even used the nets, so I’m not even sure how they snapped. We were really looking to teach our 3 year old soccer, but this was pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Poptart & Waffles

customer_reviews.title: Do the job but get damaged easily
customer_reviews.text: After only 6 months they are unfixable. We actually looked after them really well. Only used probably twice per week with a 5 and 6 year old playing soccer in the back yard. After a few months they kept on folding over and now all the support strings have broken. Real shame as we liked them at first.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nicholas Love

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: These broke after a couple months of use. We didn't leave them out in the weather and kept them in the storage bags they came with. Needless to say, the poles inside snapped in multiple locations on both goals. We didn't even use a regular sized soccer ball, we used a mini. Don't even waste the $30.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C Willier

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. I was excited to find well rated foldable nets to minimize the space they occupy in our garage. However after the first use I folded them up as instructed and when I took them out to use them again one of the sticks snapped. Now I’m hesitant to buy similar products. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: wytedaisy

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but has sadly 3 broken poles after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Sadly after three scrimmage uses we've had 5 breaks. I would not recommend. Kids were very excited to use these larger rectangle goals. In the past we used Pugg rounded popups but they were too small. These are a great size, were fairly easy to assemble, and easy to pop up, but useless if a ball hits the fiberglas poles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for backyard soccer
customer_reviews.text: Works great for backyard soccer. Moved several times, have been playing daily and the gates are holding up well. The size is perfect. One of the metal poles vended but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: busymom

customer_reviews.title: Broken- but won’t resend me new product
customer_reviews.text: When I received mine it was missing connectors. So it didn’t even work. We set up one and it was fine , but in the middle of the second goal structure, we noticed the tent poles inside were missing a connector. But the seller required us to repackage everything and send it back. Ridiculous, it was already a huge waste of time setting it up, they sent a broken product, I’m not boxing it all back up and shipping it out. It should have been replaced without the requirement!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassity Kmetzsch

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about sturdiness but held its own from the recent storm with high wind. So far so good but I have to wait and see since we haven't had it for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Marie J

customer_reviews.title: Deserve a 4 star, good enough
customer_reviews.text: Bought for more than a year, used around 15-20 times. Broke recently, maybe Because I usually left it in my car with high temperature. If store with care, it should last much longer. A decent product after all.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are trash. They are horrible to fold, the first time we used them they broke. The fiberglass pole inside snapped no longer allowing them to fold. When the did fold they barely got on the bag. And extra 1/2 inch of material would not have killed them. They are horrible and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Cool for my kids.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my kids can go outside and get exercise during the shelter in place. My kid loves it. Comes with metal steaks for the ground so it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Jenee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fiberglass poles break
customer_reviews.text: Cheap fiberglass pole broke while I had it in storage. I left town for a week and put them in their travel case. When I came home one of the poles had snapped and is completely broken and now the net is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great for fun play
customer_reviews.text: These are super portable and easy to use. I would recommend for a small child or for occasional games at a park. My son plays daily and maybe that lead to the wear on this because one of the setup sticks broke after a year. But we loved it while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my granddaughter for her fifth birthday. The second time of use, one of the nets frame just broke at the top. I do not think this is worthy of an "Amazon Choice" product. I should have bought the higher priced goals. I feel like these should have lasted a five-year "girl a long time. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: One of the goals broke after our second practice using them. Cheaply made. Don't purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast put and take down soccer goal.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great goal set up for the child in your family starting to enjoy soccer. Its super light and portable and can easily be broken down and put up in less than 10 seconds. My son and daughter love playing with these goals. It was used so much that the bottom support strap for the goal broke. I reached out to Net Playz and they were very helpful and getting me a new strap as soon as possible. I highly recommend this goal set!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bain

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shot, just off target!
customer_reviews.text: There nets are ok, pretty easy to setup. A little bit upset as the corner of one of our nets has torn off so I have to put the hook over the base rather than through the holding loop. It’s ok through for a small playing area.
customer_reviews.author: Titan Brave

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I received it today. Considering the price of 27$, this soccer goal is really good quality and cheap. Very easy to assemble, fold and store. Definitely recommended. Best orice I found. The size of pretty good for my 6 yo.
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet Camkurt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these! Pretty easy to set up, did it by myself in 10 mins, and they are great quality. My 6 year old son was extremely excited to get these for Christmas and it was a really great value, especially for the price! We have played with them a lot in the last 3 months and they've held up nicely. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Product broke after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the soccer nets as they were easy to transport and assemble. However, after only 4 uses one of the poles snapped and punctured the material as well. My purchase was outside of the Amazon return window and I am seeking warranty replacement via the manufacturers website. This rating is based on a lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great goals
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for nice goals these are it easy to take to the park fold up easier than I thought my kids love them
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: One of the goals broke and snapped in my sons Hands causing splinters - product is crap
customer_reviews.author: R. Piazza

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, quick solution
customer_reviews.text: Use it for girl's soccer practice--great value, easy to move around and to fold up.
customer_reviews.author: vinkush

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: These practice goals are easy to store and set up--from the trunk to the field. In the time my 6-year old players are tying shoelaces, my field is set up for practice. The best part was the customer service when the pole broke. I contacted the vendor and they sent out a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: B. Araki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nephew for his birthday and he absolutely loves them. They are easy to carry around and take with him. Materials are good quality. My nephew is three and so far it's held up well with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few uses. The plastic tube of the frame that fits into the metal corner brace snapped off when hit with a ball, and left a chunk stuck inside the black metal corner brace. The chunk of frame can’t be dislodged and even if it could, the plastic frame tube remaining would be too short to use the goal.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: a little wonky
customer_reviews.text: One of our poles was too thick to go all the way in... my husband had to totally man handle it and shave it down. Once we got it to fit it was worked great.
customer_reviews.author: SnapHappyMom

customer_reviews.title: Two goals
customer_reviews.text: My husband and my 2 1/2 year old son love soccer and love these nets! The assembly takes some effort but other than that this was a great purchase! Happy customers here! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Product scores 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this set for a year and they still look great after standing most of the year exposed to the sun and rain of Florida. We have had other brand sets in the past that were gone before a year. We like this very much and he is always playing in the back yard with his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ulisses S.

customer_reviews.title: Good if you only want to use a couple of times
customer_reviews.text: Didnt stay together well dont hold to ground well, lasted about 1 month now bvb they are broken
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for my children!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about these, but they are amazing! They really can be folded and put away effortlessly. I love that they take up very little room in the garage. They are also easy to travel with. My 2, 3 and 5 year old kids get them out almost every day. We use them for soccer, street hockey and even as a backstop for batting practice. Very universal and a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Morris

customer_reviews.title: Be careful while keeping
customer_reviews.text: The product is quit compartment but you should keep it very very very carefully After I put it into its sac and put it for a while along the wall after a time the sides had Brocken as it is difficult for them to be folded So it better to keep it in the yard folded out
customer_reviews.author: Kseniya

customer_reviews.title: Best portable soccer nets
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best portable soccer nets I have ever used. Much better than the pvc plastic kind and even with the stakes not in the ground extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.author: garrett sweet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The hooks that go in the ground bend way too easily Everything else is solid
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this April 20 we have used it 3-4 times and this happened, look at the picture
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great training goals for kids or adults
customer_reviews.text: these are great goals to use for training indoor or outside. They're a little awkward carrying them out to a pitch since they're so big but very light and easy enough for a 5 year to break down or even setup. i like that it gives a rectangular shaped goal instead of the half circle/ovular design by most pop-up goals on the market to give a more true to life experience. great quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this product but the quality is simply awful
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product but the quality is simply awful. Not only did my set come missing a rod necessary to set up the goal, but the net didn't even fit correctly over the rods I did receive. It was impossible to assemble so I had to return it. Between the missing pieces and the incompatibility of the pieces I did receive, I would definitely recommend buyers to find a different option.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Really like them and my son has a ton of fun kicking is soccer ball into the net.
customer_reviews.author: bethany eaton

customer_reviews.title: These were easy to put together and are very resiliant
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to put together and are very resiliant. My kids decided to play tackle the goals instead of soccer and they pop right back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor material
customer_reviews.text: after a few uses, one of the poles broke, not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C Pardo

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: Used them for a little more than 10 times. We have been gentle on them, but one fiberglass tube broke recently, which makes it hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Yiwei D.

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for “fútbol” lovers!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 yo and this was an awesome gift! I love the fact that they are big enough so I know they will last for years. Good materials, very easy to carry out. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: Hold up perfect lil on loves it, she's going to be a star.
customer_reviews.author: Reno Brown

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and easy to use. Fast unpacking and packing back up
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put away, these have been put up outside since they arrived, they are lasting great. No signs of wear after months outdoors
customer_reviews.author: G&G

customer_reviews.title: I don't like
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to assemble and fold , waste my time . poor!!!
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE NI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for indoor fut-sol practice
customer_reviews.text: Got these for some indoor fut-sol practice and they are the perfect for that, wide enough for you to learn how to push into corners and tall enough for you to get use to putting low-air on balls. They are even better for outdoor practices for 1v1 .
customer_reviews.author: Helen Johns

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was as expected..lots of pieces to assemble, fairly easy moly, decent quality for the money. Got the job done
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great nets
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality, easy to put together, and easy to use. Once they are put together they easily fold up and store in the provided bags and are very easy to set up and use. Really like them for indoor and outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Alan D Harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to set up and put back into the carrying case. You are required to assemble it out of the box; which was mildly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: These were great while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: These were great while they lasted. They broke after about a month of on and off play, but the kids did love them before they broke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! They were easy to fold up and transport. But the carry bag ripped the first time we used it. They are light and durable and folds flat so they go in a car easily.
customer_reviews.author: AmyShaffer

customer_reviews.title: Poles broke in 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: The poles broke in 32 days...2 days after the return policy expired.
customer_reviews.author: JeepWranglerMan

customer_reviews.title: Very Kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: My son ten year old is new to soccer, these goals are great, he can easily open them and out them away, when I was looking for goals to buy I noticed most places only sold one and so if you wanted 2 goals you have to purchase 2 of the item. This one is a set and its great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good goals, junk bag
customer_reviews.text: Goals are pretty good for the price. Easy to assemble, use and fold. The bag is a little too small as it is tight trying to zip up. During the second use of the bag, one zipper failed. It is not repairable. Needless to say, it is now in the trash. The goals are still working.
customer_reviews.author: TODD COX

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Zipper on. At broke the day we received item and the net poles broke the following week.
customer_reviews.author: ransom

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product so far looks like good material been putting it to daily use
customer_reviews.author: jairo barragan

customer_reviews.title: Both crossbars broken after maybe 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have mentioned, the poles are not durable. I love the size, shape and portability of these goals, but the poles completely cracked on both nets after very little use.
customer_reviews.author: TLAllen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Easy to put together and fold up!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awful Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This showed up and had pieces missing. Plus the instructions were all crinkled so you couldn't even read. Don't waist your time with this product
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just loves her portable soccer nets. They are super easy for her to put up and take down herself!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to be broke
customer_reviews.text: It's broke easily, only 2 days with it and already broke.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love these goals, cant beat this price. assemble instructions were clear and it was very easy to do. love the way the fold for storage. I am very happy with this product. will definitely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: ulysses valdez

customer_reviews.title: NOT EASY TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I thought it was a pop up goal and it wasn’t and when it came to assembly it was super difficult. And to top it off I received this product VERY LATE. I tried to return it but missed the window so now I’m stuck with these goals that I will never use. Not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pantelic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold up and store
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons are soccer players and they needed a portable goal set to practice at home. This was the perfect size. They were thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

product_meta.title: NET PLAYZ 4ftx3ft Easy Fold-Up Portable Training Soccer Goal, Set of 2
product_meta.description: Set of 2 goals, 4'x3'x3'squared structure and unique collapsible design for quick set up and break down. Fiberglass frame construction to support training on all levels. Lightweight and portable for training anywhere. All weather net. Setup and fold up in 2 sec. Bag included.
feature_bullets: Set of 2 goals: the goals come in pairs, each Goal sets up easily with a quick twist, it also includes a carrying bag for easy Transport
Durable: the goals are made of high quality fiberglass frame construction to support training on all levels, all-weather net, durable enough
Easy to Assemble: squared Structure and unique collapsible design, the Goal is easy for quick setup and breakdown, included one Assembly instruction manual
Best for Soccer training: with 8 stakes, this Soccer net can be used in multiple surfaces
